item.description: Best Adventures ever…. NO QUESTION Active Members: Qidan Daria Winter Archibald Inactive Members: Mardred Blutgard Geralt of Rivania Blue Sigma Naberus Mouse?
Through out the time the Cradle Snatchers has existed they have been climatic moments where a a Character uses a Granade. We have seen this with: [[People/NPC/Pigwings]]
Organisations Cradle Snatchers The Syndicate Octopus Tattoo Granade Users

A smiling Octopus Tattoo of initially found on the bodies of some hired mercenaries in Innadel . Later it was discovered that Winter also has the same tattoo on their back. Winter Quotes “We were a family” “I just went North to do some recon” Innadel - A number of lads travelling through has a octopus tattoo

TODO - Get List from spook :D Members of The Syndicate are mostly Rakshasa (they have there hands on backwards and are tiger deamons). They all worship [[Lady Ravana]] Members Canus - Dead Saraki - Dead Rillathane - Dead Lady Xiao Lord Itcis The Senishal Lord Capra Lord Bovi Srash Sir Equis
